backend/main.mo: Actor defines products, orders, and user profile management with access‑controlled admin and user APIs plus shop initialization with preset products.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing image‑resolution and URL‑encoding improvements along with affected frontend files and related metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of various frontend files across components, pages, APIs, and styles.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind base and CSS variables defining light/dark theme color tokens and shared UI styling.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/api/adminProductHooks.ts: React Query hooks for admin product CRUD and publish operations with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/api/authHooks.ts: Hook checking whether the caller is an admin using actor and identity state.
frontend/src/api/queryKeys.ts: Centralized React Query key generator for products, orders, and admin checks.
frontend/src/api/shopHooks.ts: React Query hooks for fetching products, creating orders, and initializing the shop.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app routing setup with TanStack Router and layout wrapped in the CartProvider.
frontend/src/components/checkout/OrderSu: Order summary component rendering item totals and subtotal in INR format.
frontend/src/components/feedback/AccessD: Access‑denied UI with icon, admin‑only messaging, and button to return home.
frontend/src/components/feedback/AsyncSt: Provides a component to display loading skeletons, error alerts with retry, empty states, or children content; includes a simple loading spinner.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Renders the site footer with brand info, quick links, contact text, and a dynamic year footer.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Implements the site header with navigation links, cart button, mobile menu, and conditional admin link.
frontend/src/components/products/Product: Displays a product card with image fallback, details, price, stock, and add-to-cart button.
Parses a description into lines, formatting key-value pairs and regular text for display.
Shows a grid of ProductCard components or an empty message when no products exist.
Shows a product image gallery with thumbnails and a fallback placeholder when images are missing or fail.
Provides a search input and category selector for filtering products.
frontend/src/content/siteContent.ts: Defines the structure and text content configuration used across the site's UI.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication using AuthClient, exposing identity state, login/logout, and status flags.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and custom CSS variables for light/dark themes plus global styles and a custom container class.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and InternetIdentityProvider, and mounts it to the DOM.
frontend/src/pages/AboutContactPage.tsx: Renders the About and Contact sections using site content, including a credit footer and a styled contact card.
frontend/src/pages/AdminProductsPage.tsx: Admin interface for listing, creating, editing, and publishing products with identity-based admin checks and product management dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Displays cart contents with quantity controls, removal actions, and an order summary, handling the empty cart state.
frontend/src/pages/CategoryPage.tsx: Loads and displays products for a given category with loading/error handling and a product grid.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Handles the checkout flow including form validation, order creation, success state display, and cart clearing.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page that initializes shop data, highlights featured products, and renders hero, categories, and product sections.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailPage.tsx: Product detail view that loads a product, shows gallery and info, and supports adding items to the cart.
frontend/src/pages/ShopPage.tsx: Shop listing page that fetches products, filters by search and category, and displays them in a grid.
frontend/src/store/cart.ts: Pure cart utilities handling storage, item add/remove/update, subtotal calculation, and persistence.
frontend/src/store/CartProvider.tsx: React context provider managing cart state, persistence, and utility actions like add, remove, and update.
frontend/src/utils/currency.ts: Utility to format numeric values as INR currency strings.
frontend/src/utils/productImages.ts: Image lookup utility mapping product IDs to image arrays with URL-safe encoding helpers.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters with sessionStorage fallback.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, content paths, extended color system using CSS variables, custom animations, typography, container queries, and animation plugins.
project_state.json: Defines current project state, including summary, architecture notes, known issues, feature list, and version metadata for the website build.
